long_description: Give your back a break and use the 60 qt. Coleman Wheeled cooler to transport cold beverages and tasty food to your campsite. Extend the telescoping handle and pull the cooler on heavy-duty wheels that easily roll over rough terrain. Sturdy design lets you use the cooler as a seat without worrying about collapsing the top. Hinged lid closes securely and includes 4 cup holders on top. Lid on the Coleman Wheeled cooler is easy to open with just 1 hand.
short_description: Give your back a break and use the 60 qt. Coleman Wheeled cooler to transport cold beverages and tasty food to your campsite.
